statements: SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents;
SELECT incident_date, location FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents;
SELECT incident_id, description FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents WHERE incident_date >= '2022-01-01' AND incident_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT incident_id, location, description FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents WHERE support_service_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description, location FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents;
SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents WHERE incident_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT incident_id, COUNT(*) AS num_incidents FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents GROUP BY incident_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT incident_id, location, support_service_id FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents ORDER BY location ASC, incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM GenderBasedViolenceIncidents WHERE description LIKE '%physical abuse%' ORDER BY incident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM incidents WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT description, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM support_services WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT service_name, description FROM support_services ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, incident_id ASC;
SELECT incident_id, description, status FROM incidents WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, description, location FROM incidents WHERE location LIKE '%Office%';
SELECT * FROM support_services WHERE service_name = 'Technical Support' AND contact_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT incident_id, description, location FROM incidents WHERE incident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Incident;
SELECT incident_id, incident_date, location FROM Incident;
SELECT service_name, contact_email FROM SupportService;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM ServiceFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Incident WHERE incident_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Incident
SELECT location, incident_date, reported_by FROM Incident WHERE incident_id = 100
SELECT service_name, service_type, contact_email FROM SupportService WHERE service_type = 'Emergency'
SELECT * FROM ServiceFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM ServiceFeedback JOIN SupportService ON ServiceFeedback.service_id = SupportService.service_id
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT description, incident_date FROM incidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, age, gender FROM victims WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY victim_name ASC;
SELECT service_name, service_type FROM support_services WHERE location = 'City Center';
SELECT report_date, report_description FROM reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents ORDER BY incident_date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT support_service_id, service_name, location, contact_number FROM support_services WHERE service_type='Emergency' AND location='City Center';

SELECT victims.victim_name, victims.age, incidents.location, reports.report_date FROM victims INNER JOIN incidents ON victims.incident_id = incidents.id INNER JOIN reports ON victims.id = reports.victim_id WHERE reports.report_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT incidents.id AS incident_id, support_services.service_name AS service_name, victims.victim_name AS victim_name, reports.report_description AS report_description FROM incidents JOIN support_services ON incidents.location = support_services.location JOIN victims ON incidents.id = victims.incident_id JOIN reports ON victims.id = reports.victim_id;

SELECT support_services.service_name, count(reports.id) AS num_reports FROM support_services LEFT JOIN reports ON support_services.id = reports.support_service_id GROUP BY support_services.service_name HAVING num_reports > 5 ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents;
SELECT id, incident_date, location FROM incidents WHERE id = 1;
SELECT victim_name, gender, victim_age FROM victims WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT id, org_name, org_type, contact_person, contact_number FROM organizations WHERE org_type = 'Non-profit';
SELECT service_name, location FROM support_services ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM incidents WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT victims.victim_name, victims.victim_age, incidents.incident_date FROM victims INNER JOIN incidents ON victims.incident_id = incidents.id WHERE victims.gender = 'Female';
SELECT org_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM organizations WHERE org_type = 'NGO' ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM support_services WHERE description LIKE '%counseling%';
SELECT org_name, COUNT(reporter_name) AS total_reports FROM organizations INNER JOIN reports ON organizations.id = reports.incident_id GROUP BY org_name HAVING total_reports > 3;
